title: karlosvas/elend-talk
summary: Elend Talk lets you upload PDF files and ask questions about their content using artificial intelligence (Ollama). Extract text from the PDF and get instant answers, just like having a personal assistant for your documents.

title: Daltonic/project_descriptor
summary: I built this Python-based tool called Project Descriptor specifically designed for analyzing complex projects by breaking them down into manageable components using advanced language processing techniques.

title: CaviraOSS/OpenMemory
summary: Add long-term memory to any AI in minutes. Self-hosted, open, and framework-free.

title: Fortyseven/chit-v2
summary: Chit is a lightweight privacy-focused web chat front-end for Ollama endpoints that uses no backend.

title: arthubhub/AI_powered_Shell
summary: This project implements a shell add-on to improve productivity with local LLM usage.

title: langbot-app/LangBot
summary: 🤩 Easy-to-use global IM bot platform designed for LLM era / 简单易用的大模型即时通信机器人开发平台 ⚡️ Bots for QQ / QQ频道 / Discord / LINE / WeChat(微信, 企业微信)/ Telegram / 飞书 / 钉钉 / Slack 🧩 Integrated with ChatGPT(GPT), DeepSeek, Dify, n8n, Langflow, Coze, Claude, Google Gemini, xAI, PPIO, Ollama, MiniMax, SiliconFlow, Qwen, Moonshot, MCP etc. LLM & Agent & RAG

title: SamLS42/BigChat
summary: BigChat is a WinUI 3 chat application built for chatting with large language models via Ollama

title: Kiln-AI/Kiln
summary: The easiest tool for fine-tuning LLM models, synthetic data generation, and collaborating on datasets.

title: mdlmarkham/SystemManager
summary: Manage your LCXs using LLMs

title: tilltmk/comitto
summary: AI-powered VS Code extension for automatic Git commits, AI-generated commit messages & customizable triggers using Ollama, OpenAI & Anthropic

title: lobehub/lobe-chat
summary: 🤯 LobeHub - an open-source, modern design AI Agent Workspace. Supports multiple AI providers, Knowledge Base (file upload / RAG ), one click install MCP Marketplace and Artifacts / Thinking. One-click FREE deployment of your private AI Agent application.

title: Palm1r/QodeAssist
summary: QodeAssist is an AI-powered coding assistant plugin for Qt Creator

title: n4ze3m/page-assist
summary: Use your locally running AI models to assist you in your web browsing

title: Ojas1584/Contract_Analysis
summary: Automated legal contract analysis using a local LLM and a 4-call, high-accuracy RAG pipeline with semantic validation.

title: childreth/Olly
summary: Personal project - Local AI app using Ollama, Sveltekit and Tauri

title: automatika-robotics/embodied-agents
summary: EmbodiedAgents is a fully-loaded ROS2 based framework for creating interactive physical agents that can understand, remember, and act upon contextual information from their environment.

title: alexandrevilain/ollama-machine
summary: Think docker-machine but for GPU cloud instances running Ollama, with a focus on safe cloud credentials storage and security.

title: Olooce/inkwell-V2.0
summary: INKWELL StoryScape leverages AI to empower young storytellers. It assesses children's grammar and sentence structure and generates comics from their creative sentences, transforming writing into engaging visual stories.

title: libre-webui/libre-webui
summary: Privacy-first web interface for local AI models. Clean, minimal UI for Ollama with extensible plugin system. No data leaves your device.

title: NeptuneHub/AudioMuse-AI
summary: AudioMuse-AI is an Open Source Dockerized environment that brings automatic playlist generation to Jellyfin, Navidrome, LMS and Lyrion. Using powerful tools like Librosa and ONNX, it performs sonic analysis on your audio files locally, allowing you to curate the perfect playlist for any mood or occasion without relying on external APIs.
